summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.1°C) and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 2712 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1780 m), light levels (up 8347 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 870.8m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and near calm conditions. Periods of rain anticipated, occasional overcast conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
